title: Vanessa Bryant Must Provide Therapy Records in Lawsuit Over Kobe Bryant Crash-Site Photos
sub_head: Widow of NBA star has said allegedly shared photos caused emotional distress
body: Vanessa Bryant will have to provide therapy records as part of her lawsuit citing emotional distress over allegedly shared photos of the helicopter crash site where her husband, National Basketball Association superstar Kobe Bryant, and daughter Gianna Bryant died, a judge ruled Monday.
